text: Helene Granqvist (born February 13, 1970 in Härnösand) is a Swedish female curler.Landslagsspelare genom tiderna – Damer - Svenska Curlingförbundet (Swedish female national curlers; look at "Granqvist, Helene") She is a and . She competed at the 1992 Winter Olympics when curling was a demonstration sport.Official Report 1992W page 630 - Olympic Official Reports Collection ==Teams== ===Women's=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Alternate ! scope="col"| Coach ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1988–89 | Cathrine Norberg || Mari Högqvist || Helene Granqvist || Annica Eklund || Helena Klange || || SJCC 1989 Swedish Junior Women curling Champions - Swedish Curling Association (web archive; April 12, 2010) (4th) |- ! scope="row"| 1989–90 | Cathrine Norberg || Mari Högqvist || Helene Granqvist || Annica Eklund || Eva Eriksson || || SJCC 1990 |- ! scope="row"| 1990–91 | Anette Norberg || Cathrine Norberg || Anna Rindeskog || Helene Granqvist || Ann-Catrin Kjerr || || SWCC 1991 |- ! scope="row"| 1991–92 | Anette Norberg || Anna Rindeskog || Cathrine Norberg || Helene Granqvist || Ann-Catrin Kjerr || || OG 1992 (demo) (5th) |- ! scope="row"| 1993–94 | Anette Norberg || Cathrine Norberg || Helena Klange || Helene Granqvist || || || SWCC 1994 |- ! scope="row"| 1994–95 | Anette Norberg || Cathrine Norberg || Helena Klange || Helene Granqvist || Elisabeth Hansson || Åke Norberg || (5th) |} ===Mixed=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Season ! scope="col"| Skip ! scope="col"| Third ! scope="col"| Second ! scope="col"| Lead ! scope="col"| Events |- ! scope="row"| 1995 | Peja Lindholm || Cathrine Norberg || Peter Narup || Helene Granqvist || SMxCC 1995 (web archive; champions from 1967—1968 to 2006—2007) |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1970 births Category:People from Härnösand Category:Swedish female curlers Category:Swedish curling champions Category:Curlers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic curlers of Sweden
